moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.effect: Has a small chance of leaving the target confused.

moves.name: X Defense All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Defense of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: To the Top!
moves.effect: Makes move gauges accelerate on the allied field of play. Raises the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs.

syncMove.name: Triumphant Hydro Cannon
syncMove.description: Become Mega Blastoise until the end of battle. The more the user’s Defense has been raised, the greater the power of this move.

passives.name: Force Field 4
passives.description: Has a good chance of raising the Sp. Def of all allied sync pairs when the user’s Pokémon uses a move.

passives.name: Team Shout 9
passives.description: Raises the Attack or Sp. Atk—or both—of all allied sync pairs when the user is hit by an attack move.

passives.name: Safety Net
passives.description: Makes all allied sync pairs able to endure the next hit they take that would reduce them to 0 HP when a sync move is used for the first time.
